summary: Fashion eCommerce website for NOIR PENGUIN FASHION - a modern girls-only brand blending soft feminine energy with bold black aesthetics. Target audience: teen girls & young women. Style: black + pastel fusion (dark chic meets soft glam).
architectural_notes: React + Next.js with Tailwind CSS for styling
Framer Motion for animations (glitter, sparkle, smooth scroll, fade transitions)
Visual identity: matte black, soft pink, silver, lavender, icy blue with rounded UI elements
Typography: bold modern serif for headlines, clean soft sans-serif for body
Floating penguin mascot icon throughout site
Instagram-style modern aesthetic with pink neon glow effects
Admin dashboard: React + Next.js with dark theme (matte black + soft pink accents)
Role-based authentication: JWT or Firebase Auth with Super Admin, Product Manager, Order Manager, Customer Support roles
Backend: Node.js + Express with MongoDB or MySQL for product/order/customer data
